category.title: French Toasts
category.description: All french toasted are served with Vermont maple syrup and butter. Substitude for gluten-free bread ($2.00).

meals.title: Bonjour
meals.description: Cut sliced challah bread dipped in our homemade french toast better, grilled until perfect taste  served with Vermont maple syrup.

meals.title: Le Petit Pain Grille
meals.description: Cut sliced challah bread in our homemade french toasted better topped with roasted coconut, cut fresh diced pineapple and melted mascarpone cheese.

meals.title: Paris
meals.description: Cut sliced challah bread in our homemade french toasted better topped with melted mascarpone cheese and roasted pears and house made caramel sauce.

meals.title: La Tour Eiffel
meals.description: Cut sliced challah bread in our homemade french toasted better topped with Nutella and bananas and strawberries topped with house made melted mascarpone cheese sauce.

meals.title: Egg and Cheese Sandwich
meals.description: Choose any one meat to finish your sandwich. Choose bacon, sausage, turkey, ham or smoked salmon for $2.50 more.

meals.title: The Empire
meals.description: Two eggs omelette style, melted swiss cheese, sparagus, zucchini, and bacon.

meals.title: Signature Sandwich
meals.description: Apple wood smoked bacon, egg homemade corned beef hash, cheddar cheese, crispy home fries all buited as a sandwich served on brioche bun.

meals.title: The Lox
meals.description: Bagel, egg, fresh tomato, sliced red onion, smoked salmon, cream cheese spread, and capers.

meals.title: Bruschetta (v)
meals.description: Egg, avocado, balsamic glaze, sliced tomatoes, extra virgen olive oil, garlic aioli and fresh basil

meals.title: Belgian Waffle
meals.description: Served with Vermont maple syrup and butter. Add fruit to your waffle $1.25 each. (Banana, strawberry, blueberry, roasted coconut, chocolate chips, pineapple and nutella).

meals.title: ‘Loaded’ Home Fries
meals.description: Home fries tossed with mushrooms, sausage, peppers, sun dried tomatoes and onions, with melted cheddar cheese and a lemon zest  hollandaise sauce  drizzle topped with two eggs any style.

meals.title: The Grand Slam!
meals.description: Our best special offer! 2 eggs any style, 2 bacon strips, 2 sausage with a choice of 2 slices of french toast or 2 pancakes, home fries or tossed salad and a cup of coffee.

meals.title: Custom Breakfast
meals.description: Three eggs any style choose bacon, signature sausage or ham, come with house toast and home fries or tossed salad.

meals.title: Huevos Rancheros
meals.description: Two eggs any style topped w/onions, peppers, melted  cheddar cheese. With black beans, sausa, sour cream, guacamole and tortillas on the side.

meals.title: Early Bird
meals.description: Two eggs any style, two bacon or sausage or ham, come with home fries or tossed salad and house toast and a coffee.

meals.title: Flat Iron Steak
meals.description: 6oz flat iron steak, 3 eggs any style, home toast, home fries or tossed salad.
